sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { checkAuthorization, getUserDetails } from '../utils' class AddBuilding extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { user:{}, form:{ 'name':'', 'total_floors':'', 'total_apartments':'', 'address':{ 'address1':'', 'address2':'', 'pincode':'' }, 'registered_owner_name':'', 'floors':[] } } } componentDidMount(){ checkAuthorization(this.props); let details = getUserDetails(); this.setState({user:details}); }; _onFormFieldChange(e){ let { form } = this.state; form[e.target.name] = e.target.value; this.setState({form}); }; _appendFloorDetails(){ let { form } = this.state; form.floors.push({ 'floor_no':'', 'apartments':'', 'details':[{ 'apartment_no':'', 'is_vacant':true, 'type':'', 'rent_amount':0, 'security_amount':0, 'maintenance_charges':0, 'electricity_charges':0, 'water_charges':0, 'gas_charges':0, 'amenities':{}, "tenants_allowed":0, "tenants":[{ "tenant_id":"", "start_date":"", "end_date":"" }] }] }); this.setState({form}); }; _addApartment(floor_no){ if(!isNaN(floor_no)){ let { form } = this.state; form.floors[floor_no].details.push( { 'apartment_no':'', 'is_vacant':true, 'type':'', 'rent_amount':0, 'security_amount':0, 'maintenance_charges':0, 'electricity_charges':0, 'water_charges':0, 'gas_charges':0, 'amenities':{}, "tenants_allowed":0, "tenants":[{ "tenant_id":"", "start_date":"", "end_date":"" }] } ); this.setState({form}); } } render() { return (

Add New Building

Address 1*
Address 2
Pincode
Registered Owner Name
{/* Address 2 */}

Floor Details


{this.state.form.floors.map((floor, key)=>
Floor No.*
Total Apartments/Rooms in this floor*
Apartment/Room Details

{floor.details.map((apartment, k)=>
Aprtment No.
Is Vacant
Type
Monthly Rent
Security Amount
Maintenance Charges
Electricity Charges
Water Charges
Gas Charges
Tenants Allowed
{/* Water Charges */}
{/* Gas Charges */}
)}
)} {!this.state.form.floors.length && (

No Floor Added

)}
); } } export default withRouter(AddBuilding);
